title: RTCPeerConnection: addIceCandidate() method
summary:
When a website or app using RTCPeerConnection receives a new ICE candidate from the remote peer over its signaling channel, it delivers the newly-received candidate to the browser's ICE agent by calling RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate().
  This adds this new remote candidate to the RTCPeerConnection's remote description, which describes the state of the remote end of the connection.
pageTitle: RTCPeerConnection: addIceCandidate() method - Web APIs | MDN
